About me

I am a UX guy that combines passion in psychology, human-centered design, accessibility and technology to improve the impact of Nonprofits.

A picture of me during a consultation.

Services I can help you with

UX Research

UX research provides a window into your volunteers’ and donors’ world: from what they need to what makes them tick. Research takes the guesswork out of creating a great experience and give you the insight and evidence you need to make the right decisions.

What can I do for you:

  • Consulting and give lessons
  • Task Analysis
  • User Research Methods
  • Checks & Audits
  • Wireframing & Prototyping
  • Expert UX Reviews & Design Recommendations
  • Usability Testing - design, facilitation, analysis, reporting

UX Design

I use UX design to answer challenging problems and find opportunities to go beyond initial thinking.

What can I do for you:

  • Consulting and give lessons
  • Task Analysis
  • User Research Methods
  • Checks & Audits
  • Wireframing & Prototyping
  • Expert UX Reviews & Design Recommendations
  • Usability Testing - design, facilitation, analysis, reporting

UX Strategy

My UX strategy services help to provide coherence and coordination across all of your digital projects and products. A strategic approach will provide you with a clear vision that ensures you get the greatest return on your investment in UX.

What can I do for you:

  • User Journey & Analysis
  • Find low hanging fruits
  • A/B Testing & Content Experiments
  • Heatmapping & Eye-Tracking
  • Build Landingpages & optimize it
  • Implement & Reporting

Erfolg braucht Vielfalt.
